AUTHOR: ZeLarpMaster#0818
INSTALL_MSG:
Enjoy your birthday cog!
Remember to setup the role and channel or else it will only act as a list of birthdays :wink:
NAME: Birthdays
SHORT: Announce birthdays and give a role during people's birthdays
DESCRIPTION: Users set their birthday and optionaly their age and they automatically receive a role on their birthday with an announcement in a channel
